title: GET_ENTITY_SPEED
content:
0xD5037BA82E12416F0x9E1E4798// GetEntitySpeed
float GET_ENTITY_SPEED(Entity entity);Parameters:entity: Entity id you want to test for speed.Returns: Speed of a entity in m/s. You can convert to km/h using the value you get and multiply by 3.6, and miles/h by 2.236936. Also, the float returned is the length of GET_ENTITY_SPEED_VECTORGet the speed of a entity.
codeBlocks:
local entity = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_ENTITY_SPEED
GetEntitySpeed(entity)
